content.text:
I'll start by exploring the codebase to understand its current state.

Tool: Bash
Input: {"command": "ls -la /Users/yoav/projects/alignment-hive"}
Output: total 16
drwxr-xr-x   5 yoav  staff   160 Dec 24 01:22 .
drwxr-xr-x  56 yoav  staff  1792 Dec 24 01:22 ..
drwxr-xr-x   3 yoav  staff    96 Dec 24 10:58 .claude
drwxr-xr-x  12 yoav  staff   384 Dec 24 01:27 .git
-rw-r--r--   1 yoav  staff  1741 Dec 24 01:27 README.md

Tool: Bash
Input: {"command": "ls -la /Users/yoav/projects/alignment-hive/.claude"}
Output: total 0
drwxr-xr-x  3 yoav  staff   96 Dec 24 10:58 .
drwxr-xr-x  5 yoav  staff  160 Dec 24 01:22 ..
drwxr-xr-x  2 yoav  staff   64 Dec 24 10:58 commands

Tool: Bash
Input: {"command": "ls -la /Users/yoav/projects/alignment-hive/.claude/commands"}
Output: total 0
drwxr-xr-x  2 yoav  staff  64 Dec 24 10:58 .
drwxr-xr-x  3 yoav  staff  96 Dec 24 10:58 ..

This is a very early-stage project with just a README and an empty `.claude/commands` directory. The project is ready for initial setup. I'm available to help explore or plan implementation of the features described in the README.
